detail_desc: Fabric sandals with crossover straps with a decorative knot at the front, and a braided jute trim around the soles. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front approx. 2.5 cm, heel 4 cm.

Top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with ties at the sides and a flounced trim.
Short, off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with long raglan sleeves, a wide ribbed trim around the neckline and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Soft, non-wired lace bra with moulded, lightly padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.

Short dress in a patterned cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and elasticated, elbow-length puff sleeves. Gathered seam at the hips for added width. Lined with a V-neck underdress with adjustable shoulder straps.
Calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and buttons down the front. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, low crotch, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Fitted tops in soft jersey with short sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Nursing tops in soft viscose jersey with a round neckline, short sleeves and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Low-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Waist belt with a metal buckle. The belt narrows at the ends. Width 2-4 cm.
Jacket in a cotton weave with a zip down the front and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Fake welt front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Earmuffs in faux fur with an imitation leather headband.

Short, strapless slip with a padded balconette bra in sturdy microfibre. Slip with a gentle shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs. Bra with underwired, moulded cups with extra-thick padding to lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Laser-cut hem with a silicone trim at the front. Shoulder straps included.
Treggings in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Tunic in softly draping silk with a sheen. Opening at the top with wide, double-layered edges and narrow ties with tassels. Long dolman sleeves with an opening and wide cuffs with covered buttons.
Leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit containing glittery threads with embroidery on the turned-up hem and faux fur pompoms on top.
A pair of metal earrings in the shape of spiders. The zinc content of the earrings is recycled.
Two pairs of leggings in different colours of washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shorts in cotton sweatshirt fabric. High waist with covered elastication, pockets in the side seams and a welt back pocket. Wide legs with a small silicone appliqué.
Short top in lace-knit cotton with long, scallop-trimmed trumpet sleeves and a scalloped hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.
Satin-covered Alice band with a faux fur halo on top.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Shirt in an organic cotton weave with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lace trim. Lined cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trainers with lacing at the front, mesh linings, cotton twill insoles and rubber soles.
Hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 10 cm.

Short, wide blouse in a crinkled weave with a deep neckline and small opening with ties at the front. Long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a gathered seam with a broderie anglaise, scalloped flounce at the hem.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in airy chiffon with sequined embroidery, a V-neck at the back and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey. Round, picot-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with a picot trim.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim with an extra-high waist and zip fly and button. Slightly looser fit with straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit with a motif on the front.
Skater skirt in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with high-cut legs and a high cut at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, long raglan sleeves and a kangaroo pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skater skirt in jersey with an elasticated waist and visible zip at the back.
Shorts in stretch, denim-look jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short skirt in grained imitation leather with a high waist and visible zip at the back. Lined.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, diagonal zip at the front and long sleeves with decorative stitching at the elbows. Side pockets, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck, wrapover front with narrow ties at one side, long sleeves and a seam at the waist.

Fancy dress costume in jersey consisting of a cape, sleeveless top and plastic vampire teeth. The cape has a high collar and hook and loop fastening at the front. The top has a turtle neck and a print motif on the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with jersey-lined, opening cups with removable inserts. Adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Ankle boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded edge, elastic laces and a hook and loop fastening at the front. Lightly padded tongue that can easily be pulled forward to make it easier to put the boots on. Reflective details, fleece linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Short-sleeved tunic in soft jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Trousers in soft cotton twill. High waist, zip fly and button, and a detachable, adjustable belt with a plastic fastener. Diagonal side pockets, flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastening, and tapered legs.
Short corduroy skirt with a zip fly and button, pleats at the front, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Round earrings in metal painted in various colours.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed polo neck and dropped shoulders. Long, wide sleeves with ribbing and decorative, pearly buttons at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in soft, washed denim. High paper bag waist with a detachable belt, zip fly and two buttons. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with short, elasticated, frill-trimmed sleeves and flounces down the front. Opening with buttons at the back, a smocked seam at the waist and slit at the front. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Mules in grained imitation leather with wide crossover straps at the front and a decorative metal ring on top. Imitation leather linings and insoles.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elasticated tops.
Trousers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Car coat in water-repellent functional fabric with a collar, mesh-lined, loose yoke at the back and taped zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Long sleeves with a tab and fastener at the cuffs, ventilation holes with eyelets under the sleeves and a reflective print on one sleeve. Single back vent. Lining with taped seams.

V-neck tunic in an airy cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, gently dropped shoulders with front-facing shoulder seams and long, voluminous sleeves with wide buttoned cuffs. Seam at the hips with a flare to the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening and button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in a sturdy viscose weave with a collar, V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets and a seam at the waist with a detachable D-ring belt. Unlined.
Ankle boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 7 cm.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Padded canvas jacket with a fleece-lined, drawstring hood with a peak. Zip and wind flap with press-studs and a concealed hook and loop fastening down the front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Flap chest and front pockets with a hook and loop fastening, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and two inner pockets, one with a zip and one with a press-stud. Quilted lining.
Top in pleated jersey with a slight sheen. Pleated, stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front with ties at the top, and pleated flutter sleeves. Unlined.
Slip-on mesh trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjama T-shirt and shorts in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and shorts with an elasticated waist.
Long lace skirt with a high, elasticated waist and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening at the back. The skirt is longer at the back creating a small train. Lined.
Imitation suede sandals with a scalloped foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 8 cm.
Wide-fitting, sleeveless top in slub cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps, a gathered seam at the top and woven fabric edges with broderie anglaise at the hem.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Slingbacks with pointed toes in a jacquard weave made from recycled polyester. Elastic strap at the back and wide grosgrain ribbons that tie around the ankle. Satin linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
